verses.verse: And it came to <S%H3414>pass<s%>, that when Jeremiah had made a <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, for which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to <S%H1697>them<s%>, even all these words,

Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1955>Hoshaiah<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H2086>proud<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, You <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H935>Go<s%> not into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to live <S%H1481>there<s%>:

But <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%> sets you <S%H5496>on<s%> against <S%H4616>us<s%>, for to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, that they might put us to <S%H4191>death<s%>, and carry us away <S%H1540>captives<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

So <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

But <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that were <S%H7725>returned<s%> from all <S%H1471>nations<s%>, where they had been <S%H5080>driven<s%>, to <S%H1481>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>;

Even <S%H1397>men<s%>, and <S%H802>women<s%>, and <S%H2945>sons<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and every <S%H5315>person<s%> that <S%H5018>Nebuzar<s%>–adan the <S%H7227>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> had <S%H3240>left<s%> with <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%>.

So they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: for they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: thus <S%H935>came<s%> they even to <S%H8471>Tahpanhes<s%>.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H2934>hide<s%> them in the <S%H4423>clay<s%> in the <S%H4404>brickkiln<s%>, which is at the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes<s%>, in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3064>Judah<s%>;

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H7971>Behold<s%>, I will send and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4605>upon<s%> these <S%H68>stones<s%> that I have <S%H2934>hid<s%>; and he shall <S%H5186>spread<s%> his royal pavilion over <S%H8237>them<s%>.

And when he <S%H935>comes<s%>, he shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and deliver such as are for <S%H4194>death<s%> to <S%H4194>death<s%>; and such as are for <S%H7628>captivity<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity<s%>; and such as are for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H7617>them<s%>, and carry them away captives: and he shall <S%H5844>array<s%> himself with the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, as a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> puts <S%H5844>on<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%>; and he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from there in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

He shall <S%H7665>break<s%> also the <S%H4676>images<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth<s%>–shemesh, that is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall he <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.
